name: responsive-web-page-html-css
description: A mobile-first responsive portfolio website showcasing modern front-end development skills. Built with semantic HTML5, CSS3, and accessibility best practices.

scripts.build: npm run build:prepare && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:copy: cp -r index.html css images dist/ && echo 'Build complete! Static files ready in dist/ directory'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Ready for deployment! Upload dist/ folder to your hosting service'
